prompt:
Write a brief description of someone who has just learned how to do something new and exciting.
Imagine meeting someone who has just taken up surfing for the very first time! They are absolutely thrilled about it, as they feel so liberated being out in nature, riding waves with no one but sea gulls for company. Their enthusiasm is contagious; they talk animatedly about everything related to surfing – from how much fun it is, to its physical challenges, even mentioning that their friends are jealous!
